concept.title: Migrate to Java 8
concept.shortdesc: version 2.5.0.0 requires Java 8. If your previous version ran on Java 7, you must migrate to Java 8 before upgrading to the latest version.

conbody.p: All services that use Data Collector JAR files also must run on Java 8. This means that your Hadoop cluster must run on Java 8 if you are using cluster pipelines, the Spark Executor, or the MapReduce Executor.
To migrate to Java 8, complete the following steps before upgrading to the latest version:

ol.li: If you customized Java configuration options in the SDC_JAVA7_OPTS environment variable and if those options are valid in Java 8, migrate those customizations to the SDC_JAVA8_OPTS environment variable.
Restart and verify that it works as expected.
If any pipelines include the JavaScript Evaluator processor, open the pipelines and validate the scripts on Java 8.
